Commercial Transparency

Promote your locksmith listing

Get more visibility in competitive areas — without affecting verification or trust.

  • Appear in prominent positions on relevant local pages
  • Clearly labelled as "Featured" — never disguised as organic
  • Pay for visibility, not fabricated ratings
Upgrade to Featured View full pricing

Featured Slots

High Visibility
Featured
Organic Results Below

Representation of a city/town directory page

Visibility Insight

In competitive areas, featured listings are shown above organic results to ensure you are seen first by local customers.

How featured placement works

We've built a system that increases visibility without compromising the integrity of the directory.

Standards & Fairness

1

Identical Verification Standards

Featured locksmiths must meet the exact same verification standards as organic ones. Paying does not bypass our identity insurance or DBS checks.

2

Strict Relevance

Your listing only appears if it matches the customer's specific service needs and geographic area. You cannot buy placement in towns you do not serve.

3

Hard Caps on Inventory

We limit the number of featured spots per page (max 3) to maintain a fair ecosystem and ensure organic results remain visible.

The "Not For Sale" List

To preserve trust, the following elements can never be bought, regardless of subscription tier:

Editorial "Best Of" rankings
Verification Badges (DBS/Insured)
Review scores or star ratings
Removal of negative reviews

Common questions from professionals

Does paying improve my rating?

No. Ratings are aggregated from real customer reviews. We do not inflate review scores for advertisers.

Can I cancel anytime?

Yes. Featured placement is billed monthly. You can downgrade or cancel at any time via your dashboard.

Is promotion required to get leads?

No. Many locksmiths succeed with organic listings. Promotion is a tool for faster growth in high-competition zones.

Does this affect my verification?

No. All locksmiths are subject to the same strict identity and insurance checks to remain on the platform.
